Articles.Content: KSP2 has introduced many plants and one of them in Puff. Puff is a weird planet with two icecaps and one giant ocean on one half of the planet. The planet is not in the Kerbal Solar System but it will be a planet that you can see while interstellar travel. The planets almost looks like Laythe. It looks to have an atomphophere and the water seems to be a liquid in the giant ocean. The planet is a new one and people can’t wait to explore it.
There's already a discussion about Puff (Mike).
